maqras.text: 19|22|Atahpara se take garbhe dharana karala ebam ta saha durera eka sthane cale gela [1].
19|23|Atahpara prasaba-bedana take eka khejura-gachera nice asraya nite badhya karala. Se balala, ‘haya, era age yadi ami mare yetama [1] ebam manusera smrti theke sampurna hariye yetama.
19|24|Takhana phirisata tara nica theke deke take balala, ‘tumi peresana hayo na [1], tomara padadese tomara raba eka nahara srsti karechena [2]
19|25|‘ara tumi tomara dike khejura-gachera kande nara da'o, seta tomara upara taja-paka khejura phelabe.

19|26|‘Kaje'i kha'o, pana kara ebam cokha jura'o. Atahpara manusera madhye ka'uke'o yadi tumi dekha takhana balo, ami dayamayera uddese maunata abalambanera manata karechi [1]. Kaje'i aja ami kichute'i kono manusera sathe kathabarta balabo na [2]
19|27|tarapara se santanake niye tara sampradayera kache upasthita hala; tara balala, ‘he mara'iyama! Tumi to eka aghatana kare basecha [1].
19|28|‘He harunera bona! [1] Tomara pita asat byakti chila na ebam tomara ma'o chila na byabhicarini [2].
19|29|Takhana mara'iyama santanera prati ingita karala. Tara balala, ‘ye kalera sisu tara sathe amara kemana kare katha balaba?’
19|30|Tini balalena, ‘ami to allahara banda. Tini amake kitaba diyechena, amake nabi karechena
19|31|‘yekhane'i ami thaki na kena tini amake barakatamaya [1] karechena, tini amake nirdesa diyechena yatadina jibita thaki tatadina salata o yakata adaya karate [2]
19|32|‘ara amake amara mayera prati anugata karechena ebam tini amake karenani ud'dhata, hatabhagya
19|33|‘Amara prati santi yedina ami janma labha karechi [1], yedina amara mrtyu habe ebam yedina jibita abasthaya ami ut'thita haba.
19|34|E-i mara'iyamera putra isa. Ami balalama satya katha, ye bisaye tara sandeha posana karache [1].
19|35|Allah emana nana ye, kono santana grahana karabena, tini pabitra mahimamaya. Tini yakhana kichu sthira karena, takhana setara jan'ya balena, ‘ha'o’ tate'i ta haye yaya.
19|36|Ara niscaya'i allah amara raba o tomadera raba; kaje'i tomara tamra ibadata kara, eta'i sarala patha [1].
19|37|Atahpara dalagulo nijedera madhye matanaikya srsti karala [1], kaje'i durbhoga kapheradera jan'ya mahadibasa pratyaksakale [2].
19|38|Tara yedina amadera kache asabe sedina tara kata camatkara sunabe o dekhabe [1]! Kintu yalemara aja spasta bibhrantite ache.’
19|39|Ara taderake satarka kare dina paritapera dina [1] sambandhe, yakhana saba sid'dhanta haye yabe. Athaca tara rayeche gaphalatite nimajjita ebam tara imana anache na.
19|40|Niscaya yamina o tara upara yara ache tadera curanta malikana amadera'i ra'ibe ebam amadera'i kache tara pratyabartita habe [1].
19|41|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe ibarahimake [1]; tini to chilena eka satyanistha [2] nabi.
19|42|Yakhana tini tara pitake balalena, ‘he amara pita! Apani tara ibadata karena kena ye suna na, dekhe na ebam apanara kono kaje'i ase na?’
19|43|‘He amara pita! Amara kache to eseche jnana ya apanara kache aseni; kaje'i amara anusarana karuna, ami apanake sathika patha dekhaba.
19|44|‘He amara pita! Sayatanera ibadata karabena na [1]. Sayatana to dayamayera abadhya.
19|45|‘He amara pita! Niscaya ami asanka karachi ye, apanake dayamayera sasti sparsa karabe, takhana apani haye parabena sayatanera bandhu.

19|46|Pita balala, ‘he ibarahima! Tumi ki amara upasyadera theke bimukha? Yadi tumi birata na ha'o tabe abasya'i ami patharera aghate tomara prana nasa karaba; ara tumi ciratare amake tyaga kare cale ya'o.
19|47|Ibarahima balalena, ‘apanara prati salama [1]. Ami apanara rabera kache apanara jan'ya ksama prarthana karaba [2], niscaya tini amara prati khuba'i anugrahasila.
19|48|‘Ara ami tomadera theke o tomara allah chara yadera ibadata kara tadera theke prthaka hacchi; ara ami amara rabake dakachi; asa kari ami amara rabake deke ami durbhaga haba na.

19|49|Atahpara tini yakhana tadera theke o tara allah chara yadera ‘ibadata karata sesaba theke prthaka haye gelena, takhana amara take dana karalama isahaka o iya’kuba enam pratyekake nabi karalama [1].
19|50|Ebam taderake amara dana karalama amadera anugraha, ara tadera nama-yasa samucca karalama.
19|51|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe musake, tini chilena bisesa manonita [1] ebam tini chilena rasula, nabi.
19|52|Ara take amara dekechilama tura parbatera dana dika theke [1] ebam amara antaranga alape take naikatya dana karechilama.
19|53|Ara amara nija anugrahe take dilama tara bha'i harunake nabirupe.
19|54|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe isama'ilake, tini to chilena pratisruti palane satyasrayi [1] ebam tini chilena rasula, nabi
19|55|tini tara parijanabargake salata o yakatera nirdesa ditena [1] ebam tini chilena tara rabera santosabhajana.
19|56|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe idarisake, tini chilena satyanistha nabi
19|57|ara amara take unnita karechilama ucca maryadaya [1].

19|58|Era'i tara, nabidera madhye allah yaderake anugraha karechena, adamera bansa theke ebam yaderake amara nuhera sathe naukaya arohana kariyechilama. Ara ibarahima o isara'ilera bansodbhuta, ara yaderake amara hedayata diyechilama ebam manonita karechilama; tadera kache dayamayera ayata tila'oyata kara hale tara lutiye parata sajadaya [1] ebam kannaya [2].
